attributes.action: Stop companies profiting from funerals The cost of funerals these days is wrong
attributes.additional_details: Undertakers should not be on bonuses and it should be a bit for profit business!  No one should profit from death!!!
attributes.background: To have a chair in my local crematorium for my dead father would cost 10 grand with a little rose garden! Who can afford this? And this is after all the initial costs for a funeral. More people are lying in wait for a funeral as the family can't afford to pay it. This is wrong!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what you would like the Government or Parliament to do to address the cost of funerals. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The Government already provides Funeral Payments for people who are on a low income and need help to pay for a funeral they’re arranging.You can find out more about this here:

https://www.gov.uk/funeral-payments/overview
